description: A paginated call to get pricing plans for the given billing period. If you don't provide a billing period, the current billing period is used.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ListPricingPlansFilter that specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARNs) of pricing plans to retrieve pricing plans information. Arns (list) --- A list of pricing plan Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Arns
nested_params.description: A list of pricing plan Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: BillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The billing period for which the described pricing plans are applicable.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a pricing plan.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The pricing plan Amazon Resource Names (ARN). This can be used to uniquely identify a pricing plan.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The pricing rules count that's currently associated with this pricing plan list element.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pricing plan was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the pricing plan was modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get pricing plans.
